p: For cpDNA, the data set comprised 176 cpDNA sequences, which collapsed into 25 haplotypes. Mean h and π estimates were 0.8442 and 0.008417, respectively. For ITS, the data set comprised 370 ITS sequences yielding 27 haplotypes; mean h and π estimates were 0.8477 and 0.008825, respectively. The detail results of sequence diversity for each population are shown in Table 2.
